apiDesc.p: The chunk itself is a kernel side object.
Prevent Adjust, Commit, Allocate and Decommit
Set of flags used by SetRestrictions().

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: inline TInt Open(const TFindChunk &aFind, TOwnerType aType=EOwnerProcess)

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: A reference to the TFindChunk object used to find the chunk.
An enumeration whose enumerators define the ownership of this chunk handle. If not explicitly specified, EOwnerProcess is taken as default.

apiDesc.p: Opens a handle to the global chunk found using a TFindChunk object.
A TFindChunk object is used to find all chunks whose full names match a specified pattern.
By default, ownership of this chunk handle is vested in the current process, but can be vested in the current thread by passing EOwnerThread as the second parameter to this function.
KErrNone if successful, otherwise another of the system error codes.

inline TBool IsReadable() const

apiDesc.p: Tests whether the chunk is mapped into its process address space.
True, if the chunk is readable; false, otherwise.

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: inline TBool IsWritable() const

apiDesc.p: Tests whether the chunk mapped into its process address space and is writable.
True, if the chunk is writable; false, otherwise.
